work_experience.desc: I will be happy to get hired for a team which consists enthusiastic people like me striving for flawless work

projects.name: Uber - A full stack app
projects.desc: A full-stack Uber clone which allows users to sign up, book rides, and track them in real time, while captains can accept or reject ride requests.

projects.name: Web Music - A spotify Inspiration
projects.desc: A frontend music app for seamless playback, dynamic library updates, easy navigation, and a responsive design, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable user experience across all devices.

projects.name: iTask - Your own task manager
projects.desc: A simple To-Do app for efficient task management, allowing users to add, edit, delete, complete and filter tasks for better organization and productivity.

projects.name: Amazon.in - the UI/UX clone
projects.desc: A UI/UX pixel perfect replica of Amazon.in. This project is a static front-end clone that visually mimics Amazon's website layout without any backend functionality.
